1.name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix the flour, eggs, milk, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
Pour the batter onto a hot frying pan.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface.
Flip and cook the other side.

2.name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Melt butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour in the egg mixture and cook, stirring gently.
Continue cooking until eggs are set but still moist.
Remove from heat and serve immediately.

3.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter one side of each slice of bread.
Place cheese between the unbuttered sides of the bread.
Heat a skillet over medium heat.
Place the sandwich in the skillet, buttered side down.
Cook until golden brown, then flip and cook the other side.
Remove from heat when both sides are golden and cheese is melted.

4.name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Add all ingredients to a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve immediately.

5.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté the onion and garlic until soft.
Add the ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in the canned tomatoes, salt, and pepper.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the spaghetti and top with grated Parmesan cheese.

6.name: Caesar Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss to coat.
Serve immediately.

7.name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Heat the oil in a pan and sauté the onion, garlic, and ginger until soft.
Add the chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in the curry powder and cook for 1 minute.
Pour in the coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
Cook for 20 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.
Season with salt and garnish with cilantro before serving.

8.name: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa for serving
instructions: Cook the ground beef, onion, and garlic in a pan until the beef is browned.
Stir in the taco seasoning and cook for 1 minute.
Fill the taco shells with the beef mixture.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

9.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Heat the oil in a wok or large pan.
Add the garlic and onion and cook until soft.
Add the bell pepper, carrot, and broccoli and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Stir in the soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

10.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
Combine the flour, baking soda, and salt; gradually blend into the creamed mixture.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake for 10 minutes or until edges are nicely browned.

11.name: Margarita Pizza
instructions: Preheat the oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread the tomato sauce over the dough.
Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese and basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.

12.name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook the fettuccine according to package instructions.
In a large pan, melt the butter and cook the garlic until fragrant.
Add the chicken and cook until browned and cooked through.
Stir in the heavy cream and Parmesan cheese.
Simmer until the sauce thickens.
Toss the cooked fettuccine with the sauce.
Season with salt and pepper and garnish with parsley before serving.

13.name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Heat the olive oil in a pot and sauté the onion and garlic until soft.
Add the canned tomatoes and vegetable broth.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
Blend the soup until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper and garnish with basil leaves before serving.

14.name: French Toast
instructions: In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, vanilla extract, and cinnamon.
Dip each slice of bread in the egg mixture, coating both sides.
Melt the butter in a pan over medium heat.
Cook the bread slices until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with maple syrup.

15.name: Beef Stew
instructions: Heat the olive oil in a pot and brown the beef on all sides.
Remove the beef and set aside.
In the same pot, sauté the onion and garlic until soft.
Stir in the tomato paste and cook for 1 minute.
Add the beef, carrots, potatoes, and beef broth.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 1.5 to 2 hours.
Season with salt and pepper and garnish with thyme before serving.

16.name: Greek Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, olives, and feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar.
Season with salt, pepper, and oregano.
Toss to combine and serve.

17.name: Banana Bread
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a separate bowl, mix the butter and sugar until creamy.
Beat in the eggs, then add the mashed bananas.
Stir in the flour mixture until just combined.
Pour the batter into a loaf pan.
Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.

18.name: Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook the fettuccine according to package instructions.
In a food processor, combine the basil leaves, garlic, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, and olive oil.
Process until smooth.
Toss the cooked fettuccine with the pesto sauce.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

19.name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Arrange the tomato and mozzarella slices on a platter.
Tuck the basil leaves between the slices.
Drizzle with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Serve with balsamic glaze on the side.

20.name: Lemon Herb Roasted Chicken
instructions: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C).
Rinse the chicken and pat it dry.
In a small bowl, mix the minced garlic with the olive oil.
Rub the chicken all over with the garlic-olive oil mixture.
Place the chicken in a roasting pan.
Add the lemon halves and herbs to the pan.
Season the chicken with salt and pepper.
Roast the chicken for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C).
Let the chicken rest for 10 minutes before carving and serving.
